Content:: The 13th Biathlon World Championships were held in 1974 in Minsk, Belarus, at that time part of the Soviet Union.[1] Alexander Tikhonov Alexander Ushakov Nikolay Kruglov Juri Kolmakov Simo Halonen Carl-Henrik Flöjt Juhani Suutarinen Heikki Ikola Kjell Hovda Kåre Hovda Terje Hanssen Tor Svendsberget
